summary.span: 命名空間提供的型別支援在設計階段時序列化 (Serialization) 的自訂與控制。

span.span: The namespace provides types that support customization and control of serialization at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命名空間中的類別可以分成下列類別：The classes in this namespace can be divided into the following categories: - 序列化屬性，可用於指出要用於特定類型的序列化程式： ，表示為特定的類型; 使用的序列化程式和，以表示根目錄設計工具所使用的基底序列化程式。Serialization attributes that can be used to indicate the serializer to use for a specific type: , to indicate the serializer to use for a particular type; and , to indicate the base serializer to use for the root designer. - 設計工具可以實作自訂序列化的類別： ，從已序列化的狀態; 載入設計工具的文件和，牽涉到外部元件與非同步載入時，載入設計工具的文件。Classes that a designer can implement to customize serialization: , for loading a designer document from a serialized state; and , for loading a designer document when external components and asynchronous loading are involved. - 介面的設計工具可用來管理序列化處理序： ，以註冊或擷取自訂的序列化程式。、 要序列化程式提供給; 和，這樣會提供方法來叫用序列化和還原序列化。Interfaces that a designer can use to manage the serialization process: , to register or retrieve custom serializers; , to make a serializer available to an ; and , which provides methods to invoke serialization and deserialization. - 介面可以實作自訂的設計工具載入程序： 。An interface that can be implemented to customize the loading process of a designer: . - 可用來最佳化重新載入設計工具的介面： 。An interface that can be used to optimize the reloading of a designer: . - 其他協助程式類別： ，產生物件的唯一名稱的介面，適用於與序列化程式; 共用序列化內容資訊的資料結構和，可描述可序列化的物件的物件。Other helper classes: , an interface for generating unique names for objects; , a data structure useful for sharing serialization context information with serializers; and , an object that can describe a serializable object.
